 Interface ()

Detailed Description

The super class for all Nav2API interfaces. The role of an Interface is to provide the functionality of a specific area, for example searching.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual WFAPI::Interface::~Interface (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

WFAPI::Interface::Interface (  )  [protected]

Do not create Interface instances get one of the subclasses from the Nav2API class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void WFAPI::Interface::cancelRequest ( RequestID  requestID  )  [virtual]

Cancel a sent asynchronous request using a RequestID. Call this when you no longer want the reply for a request. Once cancelled the request will not cause any callbacks even if the API was about to make callbacks. But the request might be made even if it is canceled.

Parameters:
requestID The RequestID of the request to cancel.
